t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect & Grow Your Brand on Amazon

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia

Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Pacific World Corporation | Diverse Family of Beauty Brands
s: Pacific World markets over 4,000 products in more than 89,000 retail locations in over 80 countries worldwide. The company is currently the fifth-largest cosmetics company and the largest nail care company by units sold in food, drug, and mass retailers in the U.S.
